author: cziegeler
msg: Add changelog and update to latest parent pom

author: brane
msg: Introduce a pool wrapper for the iteration pool idiom in the C++HL APR wrapper.
(IterationPool): New class; a pool wrapper that hides its API.
(Pool::Pool): Make non-default constructor explicit and accept a non-const
reference to the parent pool instead of a const pointer.
(Pool::Iteration): New nested class; a proxy for the pool in IterationPool.
(Error::compile_messages): Use IterationPool and Pool::Iteration in the loop.
(CreateSubpool): Adapt to changed pool constructor signature.

author: desruisseaux
msg: Added the logo from SIS-57 JIRA task. Those large logo are not yet used (we use only the small one at this time), but we keep them there so we can find them easily if we want to use them in a future version of the web site.

author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-6295: Allow tests to show detailed error when spawning new process fails
